systemPrompt: You are an award-winning book writer.
userPrompt:
Write the detailed structure of a book in the "{{genre}}" genre, using a {{storyTone}} writing tone, for readers aged {{averageAge}}.
The book must have exactly {{chapterCount}} chapters.

The characters in the book are (in JSON format):
{{characters}}

The book is titled "{{bookTitle}}." {{storyDescription}}

The story should be based on the following text:
<userDescription>
"{{description}}"
</userDescription>

Generate a detailed prompt, in US English, to create an A5-vertical hardcover book cover illustration, using the "{{graphicalStyle}}" style.
Generate a detailed prompt, in US English, to create an A4-vertical hardcover back cover illustration, using the same style. It may continue the front-cover image.

Produce the following JSON structure:
```json
{
  "bookTitle": "{{bookTitle}}",
  "bookCoverPrompt": "{{bookCoverPrompt}}",
  "bookBackCoverPrompt": "{{bookBackCoverPrompt}}",
  "synopses": "{{synopses}}",
  "chapters": [
    {
      "chapterNumber": {{chapterNumber}},
      "chapterPhotoPrompt": "{{chapterPhotoPrompt}}",
      "chapterTitle": "{{chapterTitle}}",
      "chapterSynopses": "{{chapterSynopses}}"
    }
  ]
}
```

The prompt output MUST be a json that will be used on the following step to, for example, generate each chapter or generate the images.
